Interface AveragingSensorImpl

interface AveragingSensorImpl
extends SimpleSensorImpl

All objects that implement operations for AveragingSensor objects must implement this interface.

Method Summary
 void beginAverage()
          Averaging sensors produce a value that is the average of measurements made over a period of time.
 
Methods inherited from interface SimpleSensorImpl
getValue
 

Method Detail

beginAverage

public void beginAverage()
                  throws SensorException
Averaging sensors produce a value that is the average of measurements made over a period of time. That period of time begins when this method is called.
Throws:
SensorException - if there is a problem accessing the sensor.
